EmailTemplate.name: LE-04-25-202204-HHS-ENT-SEVT-Becker's-Annual-Meeting-2022.Pre Event Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: See what's new in virtual care at these upcoming events
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN US Becker's Hospital Review 12th Annual Meeting and ATA 2022 Annual Conference & Expo Image Doctors collaborating using tablet Teladoc Health offers hospitals and health systems a full spectrum of care powered by technology and data to improve healthcare delivery at scale. Come meet with us as we showcase several virtual care solutions at these upcoming events:
Becker's Hospital Review 12th Annual Meeting April 25-28, 2022 | Chicago, IL Visit us at BOOTH #1108 <[[https://s3.amazonaws.com/communications.teladoc.com/events/Beckers_Annual_Meeting_Hall_Map.pdf]]> | Schedule a meeting <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/meet-with-us?month=2022-04]]>
ATA 2022 Annual Conference & Expo May 1-3, 2022 | Boston, MA Visit us at BOOTH #1414 <[[https://ata2022.mapyourshow.com/8_0/exhibitor/exhibitor-details.cfm?exhid=130]]> | Schedule a meeting <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/meet-with-us-at-ata?month=2022-05]]>
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
